name: Sea of Thieves Ship Name Generator
description: Ahoy there, matey! Need a fearsome name for your Sea of Thieves vessel? Look no further! Our generator plunders the depths of creativity to deliver names that'll make even Captain Barbossa shiver his timbers!
introduction: Your ship is your pride and joy in Sea of Thieves. Don't let it sail under a boring banner! Our generator combines nautical nonsense and pirate prowess to forge names worthy of legends. Prepare to set sail with a moniker that screams adventure!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. It's easier than swabbing the deck, I promise!
Keep clicking until you find a name that makes your parrot squawk with approval.
Copy your chosen name and proudly display it on your ship's nameplate. Let the seas tremble before you!
Share your awesome ship name with your crew and friends. Bragging rights are a pirate's greatest treasure!

faqs.question: Will this generator give me names that are already in use?
faqs.answer: While we strive for originality, there's always a chance another pirate had the same brilliant idea! Check in-game to ensure your chosen name is available.

faqs.question: Can I use numbers or special characters in my ship name?
faqs.answer: Sea of Thieves has its own rules, savvy? This generator focuses on swashbuckling words, but you can always add your own flair later. Check the game's naming guidelines for specifics.

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: Free as the salty sea air, me heartie! Use it as much as you like to find the perfect name for your vessel.

faqs.question: How often are new ship name ideas added?
faqs.answer: We're constantly plundering the depths of creativity for fresh ideas! Expect regular updates with new prefixes and suffixes to keep your ship names unique.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! The sea is vast and full of possibilities. Or, get inspired and mix and match parts of different names to create your own masterpiece!

faqs.question: Can I suggest name ideas for the generator?
faqs.answer: Aye, you can! We welcome suggestions from fellow pirates. Send us your ideas through our contact form, and we might just add them to our treasure trove of names!
